Summary I am a business leader at IBM with over 18 years of technology industry experience who is known for solving clients problems, turning around underperforming business units, designing and building innovative systems, and growing ecosystems in emerging markets. My skill set includes competencies in gamification, open source, Mobile, Cloud, Big Data and Social Business. I have run sales teams across the IBM SW portfolio and have delivered training throughout the world. As an accomplished and recognized speaker, I have addressed the United Nations and been the keynote speaker at several global conferences. Currently, I run channel marketing for all of IBM's 1800+ North American software Business Partners. Prior to joining IBM, I received my Master of International Management degree from Thunderbird and Master of Business Administration degree from Arizona State University.
